txt.en: 'Have you seen the Lonely Span yet? It is a bridge that connects the Great Delving to the Twenty-first Hall in Zelem-melek, and it is a vital checkpoint in our expedition.\n\n'If it is safe, you should plant a banner of the dwarves there. As long as it stands, we will know that the Lonely Span is held for the dwarves of Khazad-d没m!'

'Well done, [placeholder]! As long as that banner stands, the Lonely Span will be safe for the members of this expedition and all the Free Peoples who wish to use this road once more! It was a small task, but a meaningful one.'
The dwarves of the Dolven-view wish to mark the Lonely Span as a passageway owned now by dwarves, and no other creature of Moria.
Planted a dwarf-banner on the Lonely Span
Plant a banner to claim the Lonely Span for the dwarves
The Lonely Span can be found by following the east path past the Cooling Chamber from the Dolven-view camp.\n\nYou should head to the Lonely Span and plant a banner of the dwarves there.
Return to S贸t at the Dolven-view
S贸t is in the Dolven-view in the Great Delving of Moria.\n\nYou should return to S贸t now that the bridge to the Twenty-first Hall has been claimed by the dwarf-expedition.
